p: The cohort of genes where RUNX1/RUNX1T1 represses alternative TSSs includes the NAD kinase gene NADK, the RUNX1T1 paralogue CBFA2T3, the kinase gene RPS6KA1 and the rhomboid kinase gene PARL (Supplementary Data 6, 7). In each case, loss of RUNX1/RUNX1T1 activated an alternative TSS that either exclusively affected the 5’-UTR as in the case of NADK, was predicted to change only the N-terminal amino acids of the corresponding protein (e.g., CBFA2T3, RPS6KA1) or may have caused larger N-terminal deletions (e.g., PARL).
